t: Tru Cabinetry

t: About | Tru Cabinetry
s: At Tru Cabinetry, we’re all about helping our customers create spaces where everyone feels welcome. They’re places to come together over food, drink, and conversation. They’re places to unwind after long, busy days. They’re places where families, friends, and neighbors connect and make memories. These are our modern-day priorities, and we’re creating modern-day kitchens, living spaces, and bathrooms. We strive to be the first-choice brand ...

t: Tru Cabinetry shutting its doors | Woodworking Network
s: Ashland, Ala.-based Tru Cabinetry cabinet company told its employees on August 18 that September 3 will be the last day on the job for many of them. Many others will be out of work before that date.
